SELECT c.id, au.avatar, au.nickname, IF(rau.nickname is null,'æ— ',rau.nickname) as replyNickname, a.title as articleTitle, c.content, c.create_time FROM b_comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, user_auth_id FROM b_user ) u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM b_user_auth ) au ON u.user_auth_id = au.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, title FROM b_article ) a ON c.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, user_auth_id FROM b_user ) ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM b_user_auth ) rau ON ru.user_auth_id = rau.id
au.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or rau.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

SELECT c.id, c.user_id, au.nickname, au.avatar, c.reply_user_id, a.nickname AS reply_nickname, c.parent_id, c.content, c.create_time FROM b_comment c left JOIN b_user u ON c.user_id = u.id left JOIN b_user r ON c.reply_user_id = r.id left JOIN b_user_auth a ON a.id = r.user_auth_id left JOIN b_user_auth au ON au.id = u.user_auth_id WHERE c.parent_id =#{id} limit 3
SELECT parent_id as comment_id, count(1) AS reply_count FROM b_comment WHERE parent_id =#{id} GROUP BY parent_id
